name: OverClocked Edited
description:
السلام عليكم و رحمة الله وبركاته

I have taken the game deeveloped by Alara Bread and modified it to remove the haram contents. In this case it was:

- The Music

- The Sound Effects (sfx)

and I replaced those files with an empty.wav file.

I also replaced the Label Name from "Music" to "Background Audio" and "SFX" to "Sounds",
but the variable names are still the same

This modification was done by Tall Lobster

The game was released with no license. So I will be using "license0" license.

Edited with Godot v3.3.2

Original Copy:

https://github.com/AlaraBread/Overclocked

# Overclocked

A game made for Godot Wild Jam #37

[Play it on itch.io here](https://jul2040.itch.io/overclocked)
